title: NA random increase of ping
body:
I usually have anywhere from 50-70 ping, but as of tonight its jumping all over the place from 140-200. What the heck is going on? 

I tried port forwarding, resetting, updating, closing any programs or processes. This is a dedicated network I pay for just to play league without lag, and now my ping is mangled.

Any help? I'm in BC canada, on Telus fibre optic

replies.body:
i have the same proplem except mine is 500-2000
and i also using telus fibre optic (i live in BC CANADA 2)

Sudden increases in latency (ping) are typically caused by routing changes or problems along your routing to our servers. In most cases, this means there's either an issue along your ISP or Network Partner that your ISP connects to. I'd recommend first working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure all your local network settings are good to go before we look at your routing.

Let me know if those steps caused any observable change.
